message: Add flame intensity to the supported sensors.

Add initial support for HACS.

For now only as custom repository.

Add ecomax meter entity and services.

This entity is currently being used to track total burned fuel. It's value preserved across restarts.

Preliminary support for EM i-series.

- Re-implemented device-specific sensors using product type information from PyPlumIO. "0" is for the p-series, "1" for the i-series.
- Upgrade entry schema to version 3. Product type is now stored in config entry data.

Add note about EN300 device.

Closes #9.

Improve integration setup.

- Remove capabilities set.
- Remove button platform.
- Improve log messages.
- Improve sub-device support.

Upper/lower buffer temp for all EMs.

Upper/lower buffer temperature should be added regardless of presence of module B.

Related to https://github.com/denpamusic/PyPlumIO/issues/12#issuecomment-1400936948

Add support for oxygen level.

ecoLAMBDA module is required.
Add support for exhaust fan state.

Revert custom water heater modes.

Apparently custom operation modes are still not allowed by base component. See: https://developers.home-assistant.io/docs/core/entity/water-heater/#states

Change display name for mixers.

- In ecoMAX installation controllers (i-series), mixers should be called circuits. Related to #7.
- Fix incorrect key for circuit switch.
- Add summer_work switch for mixers/circuits.
[skip ci] Fix mixer target temp name.

Added connection status sensor.

Indicates if ecoMAX is connected to HASS or not.

[skip ci] Remove step.

Reload of the config entry is now handled automatically by the button handler.

[skip ci] Update readme.

Include My button to install the integration from the Default hacs repository.

[skip ci]  Add section.

Add readme section for device-specific sensors.
